creator: Polysoft Studios
descriptionHtml:
The best LED blacklight UV lamp simulator on the market.
A blacklight is a lamp that emits long wave ultra-violet light and not much visible light, they are required to observe fluorescence since other types of ultraviolet lamps emit visible light which drowns out the dim fluorescent glow. Black light is commonly used in detectly Art Fraud , antique forgeries and counterfeit banknotes. In addition it also has a lot of other uses which include: Criminology, glow paint effects, disco lighting, mold inspection and even detecting scorpions as many species glow under UV lamps!

This application simulates a blacklight perfectly by shining 120 individual LED bulbs with just one touch of your screen. Make everyone believe you can check their money for fake notes, or scan their favourite painting to see if its a forgery! They will all wish they had one when they see you checking your tent for scorpions on your next camping trip.
This application has the added feature of a UV filter, you can adjust the intensity of the blue light emitted or to light up further distances you can turn it off completely.
There are also 3 different scan modes you can activate to simulate a scanning function, whether your combing through an area or testing your friends money for fakes while they worryingly look on this is the tool for you.

Share this app with your friends and have fun with their reactions.
This application is for fun and entertainment purposes only.
For best results, adjust the filter level to your liking from the quick tap menu, individual device brightness will vary from one android product to another. Adjusting this setting will ensure best results.
Ideal conditions are a dark or dimly lit room or area.

Enjoy the best ultra-violet blacklight simulator with lifelike graphics and sounds that will fool your friends into thinking you can use your blacklight to scan their bank notes, search for scorpions or become a super detective checking for fingerprints , stains and many other things!!

This app has many features including lifelike LED graphics,3 different scan mode sizes, a quick one touch to start, and a sound function with on/off toggle. This Blacklight UV app comes equipped with an adjustable filter level to give it that genuine look and feel. It is easy to use and is suitable for all ages.
We keep our application size small so it won’t take up much room on your device.
it can be backed up to SD card, and it is available in over 60 languages.
Keep an eye out for more new features coming soon!!

A blacklight is a lamp that emits long wave ultra-violet light and not much visible light, they are required to observe fluorescence since other types of ultraviolet lamps emit visible light which drowns out the dim fluorescent glow. Black light is commonly used in detectly Art Fraud , antique forgeries and counterfeit banknotes. In addition it also has a lot of other uses which include: Criminology, glow paint effects, disco lighting, mold inspection and even detecting scorpions as many species glow under UV lamps!

This application simulates a blacklight perfectly by shining 120 individual LED bulbs with just one touch of your screen. Make everyone believe you can check their money for fake notes, or scan their favourite painting to see if its a forgery! They will all wish they had one when they see you checking your tent for scorpions on your next camping trip.
This application has the added feature of a UV filter, you can adjust the intensity of the blue light emitted or to light up further distances you can turn it off completely.
There are also 3 different scan modes you can activate to simulate a scanning function, whether your combing through an area or testing your friends money for fakes while they worryingly look on this is the tool for you.

Share this app with your friends and have fun with their reactions.
This application is for fun and entertainment purposes only.
For best results, adjust the filter level to your liking from the quick tap menu, individual device brightness will vary from one android product to another. Adjusting this setting will ensure best results.
Ideal conditions are a dark or dimly lit room or area.

Enjoy the best ultra-violet blacklight simulator with lifelike graphics and sounds that will fool your friends into thinking you can use your blacklight to scan their bank notes, search for scorpions or become a super detective checking for fingerprints , stains and many other things!!

This app has many features including lifelike LED graphics,3 different scan mode sizes, a quick one touch to start, and a sound function with on/off toggle. This Blacklight UV app comes equipped with an adjustable filter level to give it that genuine look and feel. It is easy to use and is suitable for all ages.
We keep our application size small so it won’t take up much room on your device.
it can be backed up to SD card, and it is available in over 60 languages.
Keep an eye out for more new features coming soon!!

descriptionShort: The brightest blacklight UV lamp simulator on the market!
title: Blacklight UV Lamp Simulator

creator: Polysoft Studios
descriptionHtml:
The best LED blacklight UV lamp simulator on the market.
A blacklight is a lamp that emits long wave ultra-violet light and not much visible light, they are required to observe fluorescence since other types of ultraviolet lamps emit visible light which drowns out the dim fluorescent glow. Black light is commonly used in detectly Art Fraud , antique forgeries and counterfeit banknotes. In addition it also has a lot of other uses which include: Criminology, glow paint effects, disco lighting, mold inspection and even detecting scorpions as many species glow under UV lamps!

This application simulates a blacklight perfectly by shining 120 individual LED bulbs with just one touch of your screen. Make everyone believe you can check their money for fake notes, or scan their favourite painting to see if its a forgery! They will all wish they had one when they see you checking your tent for scorpions on your next camping trip.
This application has the added feature of a UV filter, you can adjust the intensity of the blue light emitted or to light up further distances you can turn it off completely.
There are also 3 different scan modes you can activate to simulate a scanning function, whether your combing through an area or testing your friends money for fakes while they worryingly look on this is the tool for you.

Share this app with your friends and have fun with their reactions.
This application is for fun and entertainment purposes only.
For best results, adjust the filter level to your liking from the quick tap menu, individual device brightness will vary from one android product to another. Adjusting this setting will ensure best results.
Ideal conditions are a dark or dimly lit room or area.

Enjoy the best ultra-violet blacklight simulator with lifelike graphics and sounds that will fool your friends into thinking you can use your blacklight to scan their bank notes, search for scorpions or become a super detective checking for fingerprints , stains and many other things!!

This app has many features including lifelike LED graphics,3 different scan mode sizes, a quick one touch to start, and a sound function with on/off toggle. This Blacklight UV app comes equipped with an adjustable filter level to give it that genuine look and feel. It is easy to use and is suitable for all ages.
We keep our application size small so it won’t take up much room on your device.
it can be backed up to SD card, and it is available in over 60 languages.
Keep an eye out for more new features coming soon!!

The best LED blacklight UV lamp simulator on the market.
A blacklight is a lamp that emits long wave ultra-violet light and not much visible light, they are required to observe fluorescence since other types of ultraviolet lamps emit visible light which drowns out the dim fluorescent glow. Black light is commonly used in detectly Art Fraud , antique forgeries and counterfeit banknotes. In addition it also has a lot of other uses which include: Criminology, glow paint effects, disco lighting, mold inspection and even detecting scorpions as many species glow under UV lamps!

This application simulates a blacklight perfectly by shining 120 individual LED bulbs with just one touch of your screen. Make everyone believe you can check their money for fake notes, or scan their favourite painting to see if its a forgery! They will all wish they had one when they see you checking your tent for scorpions on your next camping trip.

There are also 3 different scan modes you can activate to simulate a scanning function, whether your combing through an area or testing your friends money for fakes while they worryingly look on this is the tool for you.
